description:
After losing the dice game that was part of happiness training, the girls are assigned to take pictures of their "lucky items" as homework. Hanako, Hibari, and Botan try to get together over the weekend to finish their assignment, but from the moment they meet, they experiencec misfortune after misfortune. For some reason Hibiki seems strangely competitive, and a sleepy-looking Ren begins following them as welll...
Will the girls be able to complete their homework?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 4月29日 ナゾナゾな罰ゲーム
